subject: Sex Crimes
Child Abuse and Neglect
Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Joe Paterno’s family plans to appeal the sanctions imposed by the N.C.A.A. against Penn State for the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal.
snippet: Joe Paterno’s family plans to appeal the sanctions imposed by the N.C.A.A. against Penn State for the Jerry Sandusky child sexual abuse scandal.
